definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Electrical treatment will be good for your rheumatism.

sentences.english: Nonpharmacological treatments include psychotherapy and electroshock therapy.

sentences.english: Method78 patients were selected randomly from the patients who were cured after two years.

sentences.english: Objective To observe the therapeutic effects of acupoint electrotherapy in the treatment of chronic hepatitis B .
